page.title: 03THE PEOPLE OF LONG WITTENHAM
page.content: The{ people} of Long Wittenham are involved in many activities based in the village. For the youngest children there is a Mother and Toddler group and Playgroup. For the girls there are Brownies, Guides and Girls Friendly Society. For boys there is a football club; other organised interests have to be pursued outside the village. Fishing in the Thames is also a popular village past-time. On Sunday mornings during the church service the children can attend children's church. The adults may attend Drama Club, Bell Ringing, Choir, Athletics Club, Keep Fit or Over 60's Club. The Parochial Church Council publishes a booklet for newcomers giving details and useful local information.
